Uses of Class
geometry.planar.LineSegment

  • Packages that use LineSegment 
    Package Description
    board
    Contains classes describing items on a printed circuit board and the board itself.
    geometry.planar
    Contains general purpose 2-dimensional geometry classes.

    • Uses of LineSegment in board

      Methods in board with parameters of type LineSegment 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double RoutingBoard.check_trace_segment(LineSegment p_line_segment, int p_layer, int[] p_net_no_arr, int p_trace_half_width, int p_cl_class_no, boolean p_only_not_shovable_obstacles)
      Checks if a trace shape around the input parameters can be inserted without conflict.
      static double ShoveTraceAlgo.check(RoutingBoard p_board, LineSegment p_line_segment, boolean p_shove_to_the_left, int p_layer, int[] p_net_no_arr, int p_trace_half_width, int p_cl_type, int p_max_recursion_depth, int p_max_via_recursion_depth)
      Checks if a shove with the input parameters is possible without clearance violations The result is the maximum lenght of a trace from the start of the line segment to the end of the line segment, for wich the algoritm succeedes.

    • Uses of LineSegment in geometry.planar

      Methods in geometry.planar that return LineSegment 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      LineSegment LineSegment.change_length_approx(double p_new_length)
      Creates a new line segment with the same start and middle line and an end line, so that the length of the new line segment is about p_new_length.
      LineSegment LineSegment.opposite()
      Returns the line segment with tje opposite direction.
      LineSegment Polyline.projection_line(Point p_from_point)
      Creates a perpendicular line segment from p_from_point onto the nearest line segment of this polyline to p_from_side.
      LineSegment LineSegment.sort_endpoints_in_x_y()
      Inverts the direction of this.middle, if start_point() has a bigger x coordinate than end_point(), or an equal x coordinate and a bigger y coordinate.
      Methods in geometry.planar with parameters of type LineSegment 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Line[] LineSegment.intersection(LineSegment p_other)
      Looks up the intersections of this line segment with p_other.
      boolean LineSegment.intersects(LineSegment p_other)
      Checks if this LineSegment and p_other contain a commen point
      boolean TileShape.is_intersected_interiour_by(LineSegment p_line_segment)
      Checks, if p_line_segment has a common point with the interiour of this shape.
      boolean LineSegment.overlaps(LineSegment p_other)
      Checks if this LineSegment and p_other contain a common LineSegment, which is not reduced to a point.
